quest.name: Those Boys of Mine
journal: This well-meaning mother has spread herself a little too thin.
objectives: Express /doubt as to what the children have been up to.

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: I swear, where did those boys run off to this time?

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: Excuse me, misssir. I've searched everywhere and I can't find my boys. Would you help me look for them?

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: Work has kept me so busy I haven't been able to spend any time with them. Even when I do have a few moments to spare, they're always gone doing gods know what.

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: If you find them and they start making excuses, you'd be wise to doubt them. Still, they've never been the sort to get into trouble. <sigh> I hope they're okay.

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: They're sure to make up excuses to avoid getting in trouble, but I know my boys. If you show any doubt of their stories, they'll tell the truth.

dialogue.name: JOVIALBOY02841
dialogue.text: Wh-What? Mother sent you to check on me? I haven't done anything bad, I promise.

dialogue.name: JOVIALBOY02841
dialogue.text: I've been studying the plants and bugs out here. Someday I'm going to be a scholar, and make lots of money so Mother doesn't have to work so hard all the time.

dialogue.name: JOVIALBOY02841
dialogue.text: I never meant to make her worry. I better go home and let her know I'm okay.

dialogue.name: JOVIALBOY02841
dialogue.text: ...I've never seen wings like this on a bug before. I wonder why they're so different?

dialogue.name: LIVELYBOY02841
dialogue.text: Mother sent you? She's always making a fuss over nothing.

dialogue.name: LIVELYBOY02841
dialogue.text: I was just training is all. I'm going to join the Resistance, and defeat all the Garleans. Then she won't have to worry about anything ever again.

dialogue.name: LIVELYBOY02841
dialogue.text: I wanted to practice a bit more before I told her, but I don't want her getting worked up over nothing. I should be heading back before she gets mad.

dialogue.name: LIVELYBOY02841
dialogue.text: What do you want? Can't you see I'm busy practicing?

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: The boys are home, safe and sound. I don't know what you told them, but they certainly had a lot on their minds when they walked through the door.

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: They grow up so fast... I usually only ever see them when they're sleeping, but I looked into their eyes today and saw a fire that wasn't there before.

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: They've never known their father, but no matter how bad things got, I did everything I could to give them a happy childhood.

dialogue.name: WORRYMOTHER02841
dialogue.text: We'll be alright, you wait and see. I may look battered and beaten, but we mothers are made of sterner stuff. Our love for our children is the greatest strength there is.
